00069 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 BOOL CSelectCannedResponseDlg::OnInitDialog()
00076 {
00077     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00078 
00079     CString listItem;
00080 
00081     FileBackedMap<ClientListItem>::const_iterator iter = mCom.mCannedResponses.begin();
00082     for( ; iter != mCom.mCannedResponses.end(); iter++ )
00083     {
00084         if( iter->second.isValid() )
00085         {
00086             listItem.Format( _T("%d - %s"), iter->first, iter->second.getCurrentName() );
00087             mListBox.AddString( listItem );
00088         }
00089     }
00090     return TRUE;
00091 }    /* OnInitDialog() */
00092 
00093 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 void CSelectCannedResponseDlg::OnBnClickedOk()
00099 {
00100     UpdateData( TRUE );
00101     uint32 * selectedResponseIds = new uint32[ mListBox.GetSelCount() ];
00102     uint8 selectedIdCount = 0;
00103     for( int i = 0; i < mListBox.GetCount(); i++ )
00104     {
00105         if( mListBox.GetSel( i ) > 0 )
00106         {
00107             selectedResponseIds[selectedIdCount++] = mCom.mCannedResponses.getKeyAt( i );
00108         }
00109     }
00110 
00111     mCom.sendCannedResponseTextMessage
00112         (
00113         mMessageText,
00114         mMessageId,
00115         selectedIdCount,
00116         selectedResponseIds,
00117         mMessageType
00118         );
00119 
00120     delete [] selectedResponseIds;
00121     OnOK();
00122 }    /* OnBnClickedOk() */
